articles.title: Repelled by high car prices, Americans are holding on to their vehicles longer than ever - KABC-TV
articles.description: Americans are keeping their cars longer than ever. The average age of a passenger vehicle on U.S. roads hit a record 12.5 years this year.
articles.content: ANN ARBOR, Mich. -- With new and used cars still painfully expensive, Ryan Holdsworth says he plans to keep his 9-year-old Chevy Cruze for at least four more years. Limiting his car payments and his … [+5863 chars]
